page.title: 01Block Description
page.content: This block is situated five miles to the south of Plymouth. The main town in the block is called Plympton. Although it used to be an important town, (It is a Stannary Town) it has reduced in importance with the silting of the River Plym The majority of the block is farmland. The main urban part consists of both new housing and the historic part of the town, which dates back to the original Domesday book. Most of the people work outside of the town, though a few work in the two industrial estates. The majority of the farming carried out is dairy, though there is some arable farming. There are several primary and secondary schools, but rather little leisure possibilities for the children.
